FuncDef: This command enables port traffic monitoring. The specified port(s) statistical information displays at the configured interval until the configured count is reached.
CLIs: port <port-id> [ <port-id> ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] [ multiclass ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to five port IDs. Port-IDs are only MLPPP bundles or bundle protection groups when the multiclass is specified.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
